author: joshd4078
content: Mario and I are considering opening up our calendars next week for some short 1:1 meetings with fellows, both permissioned and not. The purpose of these meetings would be to discuss the state of your project, any blockers that you are having, your general experience in the program, or how we can help you be more successful. If you would be interested in this kind of a call, give a üëç
